main event: An unidentified flying object was observed in Meadow Vista, California on July 22, 1967, appearing about the same size as a star with irregular edges and no distinct sound.
interesting points: The object was observed for a duration of 20 seconds before it disappeared from sight., The object's brightness was similar to that of a star., It moved in an erratic fashion and had a metallic appearance., There was no physical evidence or photographs of the object captured., The reporting witness had no prior experience with unidentified flying objects.
witness description: The witness described the object as oblong in shape and seemed to be metallic, stating that it made no noise and had no visible lights.
